author: Sheldon Pearce
title: M83’s “Go!” Gets 8-Bit Remix, Video Game
text:
M83’s “Go!” Gets 8-Bit Remix, Video Game A collaboration with Microsoft, “Meet Me at Go!” lets listeners race “through a retro-futuristic cityscape” M83 Photo by Gaelle Beri/Redferns 
Last year, M83 released a new album called Junk featuring the track “ Go! ” with Steve Vai and Mai Lan. Now, in a new collaboration with Microsoft, Anthony Gonzalez has unveiled an 8-bit remix of the song made by Kurt Feldman. Listen to the remix below. Feldman’s remix appears on the digital “Go!” remix EP and also soundtracks “ Meet Me At Go! ,” an online game that allows listeners to race “through a retro-futuristic cityscape,” according to a press release. Find a gameplay clip below, and play it here . 
The 8-bit remix will appear on a limited edition blue “Go!” 12” vinyl that will be released on April 14. The 12” also includes a remix of the song by Animal Collective ’s Deakin , along with an unreleased B-side, “Altered Love,” featuring Mai Lan.
